/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of orange and red, standing out against the clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The sidewalks are lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
